titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be established a "National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month" in September to celebrate the great contributions of Americans of African immigrant heritage in the United States who have enriched the history of the Nation.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be established a "National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month" in September to celebrate the great contributions of Americans of African immigrant heritage in the United States who have enriched the history of the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Americans of African Immigrant Heritage Month should be established to celebrate the significant contributions of Americans of recent African immigrant heritage to the history of the United States.
